{{book | title=The J.R.R Tolkien Calendar 1974 | image = The J.R.R Tolkien Calendar 1974 (George Allen and Unwin).jpg | illustrator=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Pauline Baynes]] | editor= | publisher=[[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] (UK) | date=August [[1973]] | format=Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 123⁄8 inches) | pages= | isbn=0-04-529001-6 | precededby= | followedby=None. Next calendar:
[[The Hobbit Calendar 1976]] | usablenext=1974 }} '''''The J.R.R Tolkien Calendar 1974''''' was the first official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] in August [[1973]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Pauline Baynes]]. The cover photographer was [[Billett Potter]]. Tolkien passed away on [[2 September]] [[1973]]. However a copy of this 1974 Calendar was signed by Tolkien before his death, presumably in August 1973, making it one of the last items he signed.{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkiencalendars.com/theCalendar.html|articlename=Letter of Provenance|dated=|website=[http://www.tolkiencalendars.com/index.html The Compleat Gyde to Tolkien Calendars]|accessed=15 February 2012}} ==Illustrations== * January - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Halls of Manwe on the Mountains of the World above Faerie.jpg|Mount Everwhite]]" * February - "[[:File:J.R.R.
